definition: a sound/a noise/musical pipe with 3 reeds

sentences.english: EarthSound's products have an excellent track record in the States.
sentences.chinese: 天籁的产品在美国有非常辉煌的过去。

sentences.english: Zhi imitated the natural sounds of wood and streams to make music.
sentences.chinese: 质“模仿山林溪谷的天籁音响制作了乐歌。

sentences.english: Teana is very realm of course, but this realm of no resonance what is the point?
sentences.chinese: 天籁固然很有境界，但这境界无人共鸣又有何意义呢？

sentences.english: We appreciated her beautiful voice very much.
sentences.chinese: 我们十分欣赏她美如天籁的歌声。

sentences.english: There are so many lives to explore and so many sounds to hear.
sentences.chinese: 让我们感受探索生命的乐趣，聆听天籁般美妙的声音。

sentences.english: The symbolism of the primordial petrous picture was almost the nature made.
sentences.chinese: 原始岩画的象征性几乎是天籁所成。

sentences.english: For technical authors like myself, this sounds like a godsend.
sentences.chinese: 对于像我这样的技术作者，这听起来好似天籁。

sentences.english: Those who practice sound of nature should be prudent in how to use it properly.
sentences.chinese: 天籁如何运用得宜，是修行人必须谨慎的。

definition: singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
reverberates around the rafters (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
